footer.p: Permutations are a useful feature of SprueTex that allow alternative values to be stored alongside a node.
In the Permutations tab all permutations for the [u]currently selected[/u] node can be viewed.

Would you like to know more? [url=/Controls/ImageMap.xaml#SprueKit.QuickGuide.Properties.xml]Properties[/url], [url=/Controls/ImageMap.xaml#SprueKit.QuickGuide.DataGrid.xml]DataGrid[/url], and [url=/Controls/ImageMap.xaml#SprueKit.QuickGuide.History.xml]Undo/Redo[/url]

section.name: Apply
section.p: Any permutation can be immediately applied to the selected node by clicking the [b]apply[/b] button.

section.name: Type
section.p: The [b]type[/b] column displays the underlying type of the permutation.
This is important for knowing how to interpret the value.

section.name: Field
section.p: The first column indicates the field of the node that the permutation is for.

section.name: Flags
section.p: Active user flags will be display as their text names if set.

section.name: Editing
section.p: Only the [b]name[/b] and [b]weight[/b] field can be edited.
